name: Agile Methodologies
description: A set of values, principles, and practices that enable teams to deliver value faster and with higher quality.

skills.name: Agile coaching and mentoring
skills.description: Ability to coach and mentor individuals, teams, and organizations in Agile values, principles, and practices, and ability to continuously improve their performance and effectiveness

sub-skills.name: Individual coaching
sub-skills.description: Ability to provide one-on-one coaching to individuals, using advanced techniques like cognitive-behavioral coaching, mindfulness, and emotional intelligence

sub-skills.name: Team coaching
sub-skills.description: Ability to provide team-level coaching, using advanced techniques like team dynamics, conflict resolution, and collaborative problem-solving

sub-skills.name: Organizational coaching
sub-skills.description: Ability to provide coaching at the organizational level, using advanced techniques like Lean Startup, DevOps, and Business Agility

skills.name: Agile transformation
skills.description: Ability to lead the Agile transformation of an organization, and ability to create and implement an Agile transformation strategy that aligns with the organization's vision and goals

sub-skills.name: Vision and strategy
sub-skills.description: Ability to develop a clear and compelling vision for the Agile transformation, and ability to create a strategy that aligns with the organization's goals and culture

sub-skills.name: Leadership and change management
sub-skills.description: Ability to lead the transformational change process, and ability to manage resistance, facilitate buy-in, and create a culture of continuous improvement

sub-skills.name: Metrics and continuous improvement
sub-skills.description: Ability to create and use metrics to measure the success of the transformation, and ability to continuously improve the process based on feedback and results

skills.name: Agile governance and scaling
skills.description: Ability to design and implement Agile governance and scaling frameworks that enable the organization to deliver value at scale, and ability to continuously improve their effectiveness

sub-skills.name: Governance frameworks
sub-skills.description: Ability to design and implement governance frameworks that enable the organization to balance autonomy and alignment, and ability to continuously improve their effectiveness

sub-skills.name: Scaling frameworks
sub-skills.description: Ability to design and implement scaling frameworks that enable the organization to deliver value at scale, and ability to continuously improve their effectiveness

sub-skills.name: Portfolio management
sub-skills.description: Ability to manage the organization's portfolio of initiatives, using Agile techniques like Lean Portfolio Management and Value Stream Mapping

skills.name: Agile thought leadership
skills.description: Ability to provide thought leadership in the Agile community, and ability to influence and shape the evolution of Agile values, principles, and practices

sub-skills.name: Public speaking and writing
sub-skills.description: Ability to communicate effectively with the Agile community through public speaking, writing, and other forms of media, and ability to inspire and motivate others through the sharing of best practices and thought leadership

sub-skills.name: Research and development
sub-skills.description: Ability to conduct research and development in Agile values, principles, and practices, and ability to contribute to the evolution of Agile through the creation of new ideas, frameworks, and tools

sub-skills.name: Community engagement
sub-skills.description: Ability to engage with the Agile community through conferences, user groups, and other forms of community outreach, and ability to build and maintain relationships with other thought leaders and influencers in the community

skills.name: Agile innovation and experimentation
skills.description: Ability to promote and facilitate Agile innovation and experimentation, and ability to create a culture of learning and continuous improvement

sub-skills.name: Innovation frameworks
sub-skills.description: Ability to design and implement innovation frameworks that enable the organization to experiment and learn, using techniques like Design Thinking, Lean Startup, and DevOps

sub-skills.name: Learning culture
sub-skills.description: Ability to create a culture of learning and continuous improvement, and ability to encourage and reward experimentation and innovation

sub-skills.name: Agile maturity models
sub-skills.description: Ability to use Agile maturity models to assess the organization's level of Agile adoption and to create a roadmap for improvement
